title: LF flex players for Pre Season and next season gold+
body: looking for people keen to flex and play in 5 mans must have a mic and discord add me in game or hit me up on discord Joshua#8795 thankx

replies.body: I'm keen Ryze bot gold 4 either role bot lane
also looking for people for a torny tmr for a bit of fun
NEED a top laner for torny this arvo add me or ryze bot ingame thankx

I have a team i will be starting up for the new year called, Team Digital Fury, so far its very small, but we're looking for players like ourselves who wish to better at the game we love and one day be a official team for the OCE label. If you want to ask any questions about it feel free to add me in game -shouri.
